name: Model-5C
description:
MODEL-5C

In the year 2148, the passengers of space cruiseship "Deluxia" have been enjoying their party cruise for over 6 months.

Unbeknownst to them, the captain has been neglecting waste management altogether. 

As the last functioning Model-5C trash collecting robot, you must do what you can to salvage the lives of everyone on board - if you cannot dispose of the waste in time, everyone on board the ship will plummet into the nearest dark star planet.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys:   Move

Mouse:             Aim

Left Click:        Fire

Spacebar:          Interact
